amendment.description: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 116-457 to add the text of H.R. 2546, the Protecting America's Wilderness Act.
amendment.purpose: Amendment adds the text of H.R. 2546, the Protecting America's Wilderness Act, to the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeGette amendment (A006) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 234 - 179 (Roll no. 146).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A006) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A006) offered by Ms. DeGette.
